# NSTextScalingType.standard

**Case**

Font sizes throughout the document appear visually similar to how they would render in macOS and non-Apple platforms.

## Declaration

```swift
case standard
```

## Constants

- **NSTextScalingType.iOS**: Font sizes throughout the document appear visually similar to how they would render in iOS.

items.description: Font sizes throughout the document appear visually similar to how they would render in iOS.
